  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BlockItem, HasIndexItem, IndexedItem, TaggableItem, Cloneable

    public class SuffixItem
extends WordItem
    A word that matches a suffix of words instead of a complete word.
    Author:
    Steinar Knutsen
